Module 8, Lesson 5: Consulting and Advisory Roles

Introduction

This lesson covers Consulting and Advisory Roles as part of the AI Monetization module in the Learn AI course. Mastery of this topic is essential for building a comprehensive understanding of the subject area.

Key Concepts

In Consulting and Advisory Roles, you will explore the foundational ideas, practical techniques, and real-world applications that make this area of study both relevant and actionable. Each concept has been carefully selected to build on prior knowledge and prepare you for more advanced topics.

Practical Application

Understanding Consulting and Advisory Roles means being able to apply these principles in professional contexts. You will encounter scenarios, case studies, and examples drawn from real industry practice, helping you translate theory into competence.

Summary

You have completed Consulting and Advisory Roles (AI Monetization, Lesson 5). Proceed to the quiz to test your understanding, then continue to the next lesson to build further expertise.

quiz.question: Which is a common way to monetise AI skills as a freelancer?
options: Offering model training and deployment services

quiz.question: What is a SaaS AI product?
